languages.text: {n}За острой болью следует жжение, когда культистка стискивает вашу руку над ритуальной чаркой. Но неприятные ощущения быстро сменяются онемением и теплотой вытекающей из раны крови.{/n}

{n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За острой болью следует жжение, когда культистка стискивает вашу руку над ритуальной чаркой. Но неприятные ощущения быстро сменяются онемением и теплотой вытекающей из раны крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}
{n}The sharp pain is followed by burning as the cultist clenches your wrist over the ritual cup. But the discomfort is quickly replaced by numbness and the warmth of blood flowing from the wound.{/n}

{n}The stabbing pain gives way to a burning sensation as the cultist grasps your wrist and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

{n}The stabbing pain gives way to a burning sensation as the cultist grasps your wrist and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

{n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

{n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

{n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Schmerz weicht einem Brennen, als Kibellah nach deiner Hand greift und sie über dem Ritualbecher ausdrückt. Auch dieses neue Unbehagen wird rasch ersetzt. Dieses Mal aber durch eine seltsame Taubheit und die Wärme des Blutes, das aus deiner offenen Wunde fließt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Schmerz weicht einem Brennen, als Kibellah nach deiner Hand greift und sie über dem Ritualbecher ausdrückt. Auch dieses neue Unbehagen wird rasch ersetzt. Dieses Mal aber durch eine seltsame Taubheit und die Wärme des Blutes, das aus deiner offenen Wunde fließt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El dolor da paso a una quemazón cuando Kibellah agarra tu mano y la aprieta sobre la copa ritual, pero este nuevo dolor también se ve reemplazado al momento, ahora por un entumecimiento sordo y la vaga calidez de la sangre que fluye de tu herida abierta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dolor da paso a una quemazón cuando Kibellah agarra tu mano y la aprieta sobre la copa ritual, pero este nuevo dolor también se ve reemplazado al momento, ahora por un entumecimiento sordo y la vaga calidez de la sangre que fluye de tu herida abierta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キベラがこちらの手をつかみ、儀式用のカップの上でぎゅっと握ると、その痛みは燃えるような熱へと変わった。しかし、この不快感もすぐに違うものになり、今度は鈍いしびれ感と、開いた傷口から血が流れてほんのり感じる温かさに変わった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラがこちらの手をつかみ、儀式用のカップの上でぎゅっと握ると、その痛みは燃えるような熱へと変わった。しかし、この不快感もすぐに違うものになり、今度は鈍いしびれ感と、開いた傷口から血が流れてほんのり感じる温かさに変わった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈抓住你的手，将鲜血挤入仪式用杯。你感到伤口处仿佛灼烧一般，然而很快，这种不适感就被新的感觉取代了。你的伤口变得麻木，鲜血从划破的皮肉中流出，让你感到了一丝暖意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈抓住你的手，将鲜血挤入仪式用杯。你感到伤口处仿佛灼烧一般，然而很快，这种不适感就被新的感觉取代了。你的伤口变得麻木，鲜血从划破的皮肉中流出，让你感到了一丝暖意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La douleur cède la place à une sensation de brûlure tandis que Kibellah attrape votre main et la serre au-dessus de la coupe rituelle. Mais ce nouvel inconfort est lui-même rapidement remplacé par un engourdissement sourd et la vague tiédeur du sang qui s'écoule de votre blessure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La douleur cède la place à une sensation de brûlure tandis que Kibellah attrape votre main et la serre au-dessus de la coupe rituelle. Mais ce nouvel inconfort est lui-même rapidement remplacé par un engourdissement sourd et la vague tiédeur du sang qui s'écoule de votre blessure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın elini tutup ayin çanağı üzerinde sıkmasıyla duyduğun acı, yanma hissine yol açıyor. Fakat bu yeni huzursuz his, hızlıca şekil değiştirerek yerini uyuşukluğa ve açık yarandan akan kanın belli belirsiz sıcaklığına bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pain gives way to a burning sensation as Kibellah grasps your hand and squeezes it over the ritual cup. But this new discomfort is quickly replaced again, this time by a dull numbness and the faint warmth of blood flowing from your open wound.{/n}
